com.intel.icecp.core.channels

Interface ChannelProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileChannelProvider, LocalChannelProvider, MockChannelProvider, NdnChannelProvider

    public interface ChannelProvider
    Define a common interface for building a Channel; since network IO may involve some one-time setup and tear down, the helper methods start(ScheduledExecutorService, Configuration) and stop() are present and will be called before (or after, in the case of stop()) any channels are built.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Message>
      Channel<T>      		 build(URI uri, Pipeline pipeline, Persistence persistence, Metadata... metadata)
      Build a Channel.
      String scheme() 
      void start(ScheduledExecutorService pool, Configuration configuration)
      One-time startup method to run before any channels are built.
      void stop()
      One-time method to tear down anything created in start(ScheduledExecutorService, Configuration).

    • Method Detail

      • scheme

        String scheme()
        Returns:
        the name of the scheme for this channel (e.g. "ndn")

      • start

        void start(ScheduledExecutorService pool,
           Configuration configuration)
        One-time startup method to run before any channels are built.
        Parameters:
        pool - the thread pool provided by the node; a common thread pool is used so that the node can control execution (e.g. shutdown)
        configuration - the specific configuration for this network scheme

      • stop

        void stop()
        One-time method to tear down anything created in start(ScheduledExecutorService, Configuration).

      • build

        <T extends Message> Channel<T> build(URI uri,
                                     Pipeline pipeline,
                                     Persistence persistence,
                                     Metadata... metadata)
                              throws ChannelLifetimeException
        Build a Channel.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the message type
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the channel to build
        pipeline - the channel pipeline for serializing/deserializing messages
        persistence - the persistence for all messages on the channel
        metadata - the channel metadata
        Returns:
        an unopened Channel
        Throws:
        ChannelLifetimeException - if the channel cannot be opened
